feature.label: Py4J Default Server
feature.description: Py4J enables Python programs running in a Python interpreter to dynamically access Java objects residing in a Java Virtual Machine. Methods are called as if the Java objects resided in the Python interpreter and Java collections can be accessed through standard Python collection methods.
